_header: Sinful man ne dread thee not
_description: On involuntary sinful thoughts — five couplets in John Grimestone’s sermon notebook

NLS18721.First Lines:
Senful man ne dred þe nouthÞou þu þenke a wikke
                    þouth…
NLS18721.Last Lines:
…But he þat [haþ] al þis werld to
                    callefforȝef vs oure sennes alle Amen
NLS18721.Editions:
Wilson,  Edward. 
             A Descriptive Index of the English Lyrics in John of Grimestone’s
                Preaching Book.
Medium Ævum Monographs
         n.s. 2. Oxford, 1973: 9.
